Description: Fragment of coarse, plain weave linen cloth; Six broacaded wool threads, 3 red, 3 green; Warp: S spun, c.10tpc; Weft: S spun, c/5 tpc; Edges: ragged
Curator's comments: Not clothing, from a furnishing, such as a curtain; Previous location Cupboard 64, blue box; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (19/9/1989)
